text: Lizardo García Sorroza (26 April 1844 - 29 May 1927) was President of Ecuador from 1 September 1905 to 15 January 1906. == Early life== García was born in Guayaquil. He founded the chamber of commerce of Guayaquil and was a member of the firefighters of his natal city. == Political career == * 1895 Minister for Economic Affairs * Senator for the province Guayas * Vicepresident of the Senate * Councilman of Guayaquil == Presidency == Garcia was president only for a few months. He was overthrown by the revolution led by Eloy Alfaro and was forced to leave the office. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History * Cámara de Comercio Guayaquil Category:1844 births Category:1927 deaths Category:Firefighters Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Presidents of Ecuador
title: Lizardo García
